timeline.title: Gaza War Timeline 2023-2024
timeline.description: Comprehensive timeline of events in the Gaza conflict

events.title: Hamas Attack on Israel
events.description: Hamas launches surprise attack on Israel, including rocket barrages and ground infiltration. Over 1,200 Israelis killed and 240+ taken hostage.

sources.name: BBC News
sources.title: Hamas attacks Israel by land, sea and air

sources.name: CNN
sources.title: Hamas launches surprise attack on Israel

events.title: Israel Declares War
events.description: Israel declares war on Hamas and begins Operation Iron Swords. Airstrikes begin on Gaza targets.

events.title: Complete Siege of Gaza
events.description: Israel announces complete siege of Gaza, cutting off electricity, food, water, and fuel supplies to 2.3 million residents.

sources.name: Reuters
sources.title: Israel orders complete siege of Gaza

genevaConvention.description: Complete siege affecting entire civilian population may constitute collective punishment

events.title: Israeli Ground Invasion Begins
events.description: Israel launches ground invasion of Gaza with tanks and infantry entering the territory.

sources.name: BBC News
sources.title: Israel launches ground invasion of Gaza

events.title: Gaza Hospital Explosion
events.description: Explosion at Al-Ahli Arab Hospital in Gaza City. Disputed responsibility and casualty figures.

sources.name: CNN
sources.title: Deadly blast at Gaza hospital sparks rage

sources.name: Washington Post
sources.title: Gaza hospital blast: What we know

events.controversy: Responsibility disputed between Israeli airstrikes and failed Hamas rocket

events.title: Temporary Ceasefire Begins
events.description: Four-day humanitarian pause begins, allowing hostage exchanges and aid delivery.

sources.name: Reuters
sources.title: Gaza ceasefire begins with hostage releases

events.title: Operations Expand to Southern Gaza
events.description: Israeli military operations expand to southern Gaza after ceasefire ends. Leaflets dropped warning civilians to evacuate.

sources.name: Associated Press
sources.title: Israel expands operations to southern Gaza

events.title: Rafah Operations Begin
events.description: Israeli forces begin operations in Rafah, Gaza's southernmost city near the Egyptian border.
events.internationalConcern: High concern from Egypt and international community about civilian displacement

metadata.disclaimer: Timeline based on publicly available information. Some events may have disputed details or casualty figures.
